text: Arau smarana karaa, yetiya ibraahimaka te'omra pratipalake ke'itamana banira dbaraa paraiksa karaichila, arau te'om seya purna karaichila. Allahe ka’le, ‘niscaya ma'i tomaka manara jatira imama banama’. Te'om ka’le, ‘arau mora bansadharasakalara paraa'o? Allahe ka’le, ‘mora e'i pratisrauti yalimasakalaka antarbhukta nakarae’
